channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This retiree figured out a way to pay almost no taxes. Here’s his secret.
item.description: A Fix My Portfolio reader shares how they avoided a “tax bomb” in retirement through Roth conversions and careful financial planning.

item.title: Bitcoin rallies with stocks to top $100,000 again as exuberance returns to markets
item.description: Bitcoin rose above $100,000 for the first time since February, reigniting hopes that the crypto may climb to a new record high.

item.title: MicroStrategy’s stock surges to highest price this year as bitcoin regains $100K
item.description: Bitcoin’s rally boosts the value of the cryptocurrency Strategy has purchased this year by more than $830 million.

item.title: These cannabis-sector stocks aren’t typical yield plays. Why they’re worth the risk.
Coinbase expects lower subscription revenue. A lot more went wrong for the crypto exchange.
item.description: Coinbase pins crypto drop on tariffs and economic uncertainty.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
